MessageList Class Reference
List

Message List Class. More...

#include <MessageList.hpp>

Inherits ListDir.

Detailed Description

This is a message list that is derived from the messages folders (Sys::message_dir()).

Member Function Documentation

Element* MessageList::event_handler ( int  event)
virtual

This method is called on the current Element when an event (e.g., Element::ENTER, Element::UPDATE, Element::TOP_PRESS) happens.
